title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

reading.title: Làm bài luyện đọc | Luyện đề VSTEP

passages.content:
Câu 1: According to the passage, it is believed that modern robots look like
A. adults
B. growns-up
C. teenagers
D. young children
Câu 2: The phrase "a killing spree" in paragraph (A) is closest meaning to
A. a massive murder
B. a dangerous robot
C. a fast robot
D. a modern robot
Câu 3: Why does the writer mention "fictional depictions" in paragraph (B)?
A. to emphasize the importance of robots
B. to introduce "roboticists"
C. to compare with the definition of "robot"
D. to illustrate some guidelines
Câu 4: The word "roboticists" in paragraph (B) refers to
A. things that robots can do
B. parts of a robot
C. a specialist in robots or robotics
D. robots industry
Câu 5: Which of the following is NOT true according to the passage?
A. Robots are totally believed by humans
B. People are afraid that robots can steal their jobs
C. Robots can do tasks independently
D. People worked less effectively than robots
Câu 6: The word "supplant" in paragraph (C) is closest in meaning to
A. recover
B. replace
C. help
D. change
Câu 7: What does the word "their" in paragraph (D) refer to?
A. designers'
B. factories'
C. machines'
D. robots'
Câu 8: The word "inevitable" in paragraph (D) can be replaced by
A. unbelievable
B. impossible
C. important
D. unavoidable
Câu 9: What does the word "them" in paragraph (C) refer to?
A. Robots
B. Toddlers
C. Humans
D. Modern robots
Câu 10: In which paragraph does the writer give a definition?
A. A
B. D
C. B
D. C

options.A: to emphasize the importance of robots
options.C: to compare with the definition of "robot"
a specialist in robots or robotics

options.A: Robots are totally believed by humans
options.B: People are afraid that robots can steal their jobs
options.D: People worked less effectively than robots
